description: Palmolive Vanilla & Berry Foaming Liquid Hand Wash Soap is made with skin-loving ingredients for healthy, beautiful hands. Contains No parabens, phthalates & alcohol with 54% less plastic.Made with skin loving ingredients for healthy, beautiful hands.  With natural botanical extracts, Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash Soap Vanilla & Wild Berry will gently cleanse & remove germs while leaving your hands feeling soft and smooth.  A burst of berry sweetness with warm vanilla notes to make you smile. What we leave out is as important as what we put in:- No parabens.- No phthalates.- No mineral oil.- No alcohol.- No silicones.- No soap.- No gluten.- No BPA.- No animal derived ingredients.Dermatologically tested and pH balanced.Refill & save - enough for 2 x 250mL Palmolive Foam Hand Wash pumps.Please recycle! This bottle is recyclable. Made with 54% less plastic, it's better for your wallet and better for the planet.Palmolive Foaming Liquid Hand Wash is perfect for the bathroom, kitchen and laundry.FOAMING HAND WASH SOAP WITH NATURAL EXTRACTS: Palmolive Foaming Hand Wash Soap Vanilla & Berry is made with 100% natural botanical extracts.BERRY SCENT: A burst of berry sweetness with warm vanilla notes to make you smile.FREE FROM: Parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, alcohol, silicones, soap, gluten, BPA, and animal derived ingredientsRECYCLABLE: Our Palmolive Liquid Hand Wash Soap bottle is made with 54 percent less plastic and is a recyclable bottleREFILL AND SAVE: with our 500mL Palmolive Foaming Liquid Hand Wash enough for 2 x 250mL pumps.
name: Palmolive Foaming Liquid Hand Wash Soap Vanilla & Berry Refill 500mL
